title: FS/FT: 2 Graded EPDGS and some Ungraded including EPDGs

posts.post_title: FS/FT: 2 Graded EPDGS and some Ungraded including EPDGs
posts.post_content:
Some more dupes available.

Paypal F&F preferred. Buyer pays $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards. 3 or more cards and shipping is on me.

As always, I'm open to offers, especially if buying more than 1.

If you want a better scan, shoot me a PM with your email address.

As for trades, looking for EPDG's or general upgrades to my set. Especially needing non-EPDG's of Crawford batting, Needham, and Wilson.

Will only sell one of the Sharpe and Milligan EPDGs
